# Pull Request

Thanks for contributing to **ComfyAI**! Please fill out the checklist below to help us review your PR quickly.

## Summary

Describe the changes in this PR:

- What problem does it solve?
- Is it a bug fix, feature, or refactor?

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup

## Testing

Describe how you tested your changes:

- [ ] Tested locally in ComfyUI
- [ ] Tested with different models/providers
- [ ] Verified no console or backend errors

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style and conventions.
- [ ] I have added or updated tests where applicable.
- [ ] I have updated documentation if needed.
- [ ] I have linked any related issues or discussions.
